author: PTI
title: All BJP MPs to release ₹1 crore from MPLADS funds for coronavirus relief
description: Party president J.P. Nadda added that all party MPs and MLAs will donate their one month salary towards it as well.
content: New Delhi BJP president J.P. Nadda on Saturday announced that all party MPs will release 1 crore from their annual development fund to the central relief fund to fight the COVID-19 pandemic. In his tweets, he also said that all party MPs and MLAs will donate … [+521 chars]
